attributes.action: Increase the pay of all military personnal risking their lifes on operational tours of duty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government should increase the pay of all british military personnal risking their lifes while fighiting in Afghanistan and Iraq. They do not have a choice in whether they go or not, and are good at what they do, protecting our country. They should be given a lot more benefits and a large increase in pay, it has been revealed that the highest paid job in britain is CEO's and people who generally sit around risking nothing, I think this is disguisting and should be changed immediately. People who risk their life should be paid most!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
